channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Parliament of Catalonia
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Parliament of Catalonia

item.title: Opinion Poll by NC Report for La Razón, 28 September–2 October 2020 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Ciutadans–Partido de la Ciudadanía: 13–19 seats
  • Junts pel Catalunya: 26–37 seats
  • Esquerra Republicana–Catalunya Sí: 30–40 seats
  • Partit dels Socialistes de Catalunya (PSC-PSOE): 19–28 seats
  • Catalunya en Comú–Podem: 6–12 seats
  • Candidatura d’Unitat Popular: 2–8 seats
  • Partit Popular: 7–13 seats
  • Vox: 3–8 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by NC Report for La Razón, 28 September–2 October 2020 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
item.description: TBD

item.title: Opinion Poll by NC Report for La Razón, 28 September–2 October 2020 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Ciutadans–Partido de la Ciudadanía: 9.8–14.5%
  • Junts pel Catalunya: 17.2–23.0%
  • Esquerra Republicana–Catalunya Sí: 20.3–26.5%
  • Partit dels Socialistes de Catalunya (PSC-PSOE): 15.1–20.7%
  • Catalunya en Comú–Podem: 6.1–10.0%
  • Candidatura d’Unitat Popular: 3.2–6.3%
  • Partit Popular: 5.9–9.7%
  • Vox: 3.6–6.8%
